official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish standards for the certification of laboratories engaged in urine drug testing, and for other purposes.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Drug Testing Quality Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to establish a program for the certification of laboratories for the performance of toxicological urinalysis for drug testing programs. Requires the program to conform to specified mandatory guidelines. Mandates regulations to ensure the integrity of drug testing programs. Sets forth specimen collection procedures. Prohibits: (1) performing urinalysis for drug testing without certification; and (2) subject to exception, testing for a drug or drug class not listed in certain provisions. Provides for criminal penalties, administrative remedies, injunctions, and certain civil actions. Requires fees for certification and recertification to cover costs.

titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish standards for the certification of laboratories engaged in urine drug testing, and for other purposes.
